data.name: InstructionsP1_1
data.value: The evil army of archaeologists has returned to the past and is damaging your reality!

data.name: InstructionsP2_2
data.value: You must eliminate all archaeologists with all possible combinations of dinosaurs.

data.name: InstructionsP2_3
data.value: THE WINNER IS THE ONE WHO ELIMINATES THE MOST ARCHAEOLOGISTS.

data.name: InstructionsP4_1
data.value: There are three types of military forces.

data.name: IntructionsP9_5
data.value: ALL COMBINATIONS REQUIRE INITIAL DINO HEAD

data.name: Instructions12_3
data.value: If you draw an arch, place it in the corresponding element pile and draw another one to complete the 5.

data.name: Instructions12_2
data.value: Each player starts with 5 initial cards.

data.name: Instructions12_6
data.value: You can make 3 moves per turn

data.name: Instructions14_3
data.value: Take a card from the discard pile

data.name: Instructions15_2
data.value: An army is selected to provoke (water, sand, and wind).

data.name: Instructions15_3
data.value: The points from each player's combinations are added up.

data.name: Instructions15_5
data.value: The player with the most points compared to the others and the chosen army, wins one point per defeated arch.

data.name: Instructions15_6
data.value: If the archies win, no one gets any points.

data.name: Instructions15_7
data.value: In the end, all cards from the decks formed are discarded.

data.name: Instructions16_2
data.value: You can choose any card (arch, dino, or body part).

data.name: Instructions18_2
data.value: The player with the most archers defeated wins (highest number of points earned).

data.name: Instructions20_2
data.value: You can spy on the decks formed by other players.
